ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Removal of any existing unsound, obsolete or redundant pavement markings. Removal of any foreign material or debris.

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Pavement markings to set-out in accordance with IFC Drawings

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Line marking installed as per IFC Drawings
RESPONSIBILITY: IP - Contractor Representative, WP - SWA Representative
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Glass beads sprinkled/sprayed on to line marking while in a ﬂuid state to ensure embedment. Glass beads to have uniform distribution.

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Completed marking shall be uniform in appearance, texture, width and thickness and the surface shall be free from blister, air bubbles, tears, lumps, streats, overlaps, unbeaded areas, tyre marks or other defects.
○ Edges and cuts-oﬀs shall be neat and sharp, and there shall be no visible run-oﬀ, overspray, dribbles,splash or spiliage on to the surrounding area, or on to parked or passing vehicles
RESPONSIBILITY: IP - Contractor Representative, WP - SWA Representative
